title: Article 14 – Equality Before Law
text: The State shall not deny to any person equality before the law.

title: Article 19 – Freedom of Speech
text: All citizens shall have the right to freedom of speech and expression.

title: Article 21 – Right to Life
text: No person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to procedure established by law.

title: Article 32 – Constitutional Remedies
text: The right to move the Supreme Court for the enforcement of the rights conferred by Part III.

title: Article 51A – Fundamental Duties
text: It shall be the duty of every citizen of India to abide by the Constitution and respect its ideals and institutions.
